answers.answer: Hi, how old are you? Do you have hypertension or diabetes? Could you please write down complete report of MRI along with elaborate description of symptoms?

question: I hada headache , and after MRI i was diagnoused with central brain lesion.Specifically in right crussceribri. What does it means and what further investigations needed?This discussion is related tohttp://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/297305.
